title: #zhb索引#byE.Young<yangyi@1000plan.org>#date2014.05.
content:
#zhb索引
#by E.Young< yangyi@1000plan.org>
#date 2014.05.13

######源定义 及 索引定义######
#base source
source base {
type = mysql
sql_host = localhost
sql_user = qrjh
sql_pass = qrjh1000plan
sql_db = qrjh_zhb
sql_port = 3306
sql_query_pre = SET NAMES utf8
sql_query_pre = set session query_cache_type=OFF #清缓存
}

##用户主数据源##
source user_main : base
{
#建立索引之前 把ts_user中最大用户ID写入到计数器表中
sql_query_pre = replace into sph_counter (`key`,`max_id`) values ( 'zhb_user' , (select max(uid) from ts_user) )

#sql_query = SELECT uid,uname,ename,login,title,intro,trade_str,trade_id,location,search_key,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where identity<5 and is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`<=(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user')
sql_query = SELECT uid,uname,ename,login,title,intro,trade_str,trade_id,location,search_key,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`<=(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user')
#sql_query第一列id需为整数
#uname、search_key...作为字符串/文本字段，被全文索引

sql_attr_uint = identity #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数
sql_attr_uint = trade_id #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数
sql_attr_timestamp = ctime #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数，作为时间属性
sql_attr_timestamp = last_login_time #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数，作为时间属性

sql_query_info_pre = SET NAMES utf8 #命令行查询时，设置正确的字符集
sql_query_info = SELECT * FROM ts_user WHERE uid=$id #命令行查询时，从数据库读取原始数据信息
}

##用户增量数据源##
source user_delta : user_main {
sql_query_pre = SET NAMES utf8
#sql_query = SELECT uid,uname,ename,login,title,trade_str,trade_id,location,search_key,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where identity<5 and is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`>(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user')
sql_query = SELECT uid,uname,ename,login,title,intro,trade_str,trade_id,location,search_key,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`>(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user')
}

##用户主索引##
index user_main
{
source = user_main #对应的source名称
path = /usr/local/coreseek/var/data/zhb/user_main #请修改为实际使用的绝对路径，例如：/usr/local/coreseek/var/...
docinfo = extern
mlock = 0
morphology = none
min_word_len = 1
html_strip = 0

#中文分词配置，详情请查看： http://www.coreseek.cn/products-install/coreseek_mmseg/
charset_dictpath = /usr/local/mmseg3/etc/ #BSD、Linux环境下设置，/符号结尾
#charset_dictpath = etc/ #Windows环境下设置，/符号结尾，最好给出绝对路径，例如：C:/usr/local/coreseek/etc/...
charset_type = zh_cn.utf-8
}

##用户增量索引##
##用户增量索引##
index user_delta : user_main
{
    source          = user_delta                                                #对应的source名称
    path            = /usr/local/coreseek/var/data/zhb/user_delta #索引存放的位置，路径为var/data
}


##用户昵称主数据源##
source user_uname_main : base
{
    #建立索引之前 把ts_user中最大用户ID写入到计数器表中
    sql_query_pre               = replace into sph_counter (`key`,`max_id`) values (  'zhb_user_uname' , (select max(uid) from ts_user) )

    sql_query               = SELECT uid,uname,trade_id,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where identity<5 and is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`<=(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user_uname')
                            #sql_query第一列id需为整数
                            #uname、search_key...作为字符串/文本字段，被全文索引

    sql_attr_uint            = identity                 #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数
    sql_attr_uint            = trade_id                 #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数
    sql_attr_timestamp        = ctime                   #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数，作为时间属性
    sql_attr_timestamp        = last_login_time         #从SQL读取到的值必须为整数，作为时间属性

    sql_query_info_pre      = SET NAMES utf8                                        #命令行查询时，设置正确的字符集
    sql_query_info            = SELECT * FROM ts_user WHERE uid=$id #命令行查询时，从数据库读取原始数据信息
}

##用户昵称增量数据源##
source user_uname_delta : user_uname_main {
        sql_query_pre   = SET NAMES utf8
        sql_query               = SELECT uid,uname,trade_id,identity,last_login_time,ctime FROM ts_user where identity<5 and is_audit=1 AND is_init=1 AND `uid`>(select max_id from sph_counter where `key`='zhb_user')
}

##用户昵称主索引##
index user_uname_main
{
source = user_uname_main #对应的source名称
path = /usr/local/coreseek/var/data/zhb/user_uname_main #请修改为实际使用的绝对路径，例如：/usr/local/coreseek/var/...
docinfo = extern
mlock = 0
morphology = none
min_word_len = 1
html_strip = 0

#中文分词配置，详情请查看： http://www.coreseek.cn/products-install/coreseek_mmseg/
charset_dictpath = /usr/local/mmseg3/etc/ #BSD、Linux环境下设置，/符号结尾
#charset_dictpath = etc/ #Windows环境下设置，/符号结尾，最好给出绝对路径，例如：C:/usr/local/coreseek/etc/...
charset_type = zh_cn.utf-8

#设置最小中缀为1
min_infix_len = 1
charset_table = U+FF10..U+FF19->0..9, 0..9, U+FF41..U+FF5A->a..z, U+FF21..U+FF3A->a..z,\
A..Z->a..z, a..z, U+0149, U+017F, U+0138, U+00DF, U+00FF, U+00C0..U+00D6->U+00E0..U+00F6,\
U+00E0..U+00F6, U+00D8..U+00DE->U+00F8..U+00FE, U+00F8..U+00FE, U+0100->U+0101, U+0101,\
U+0102->U+0103, U+0103, U+0104->U+0105, U+0105, U+0106->U+0107, U+0107, U+0108->U+0109,\
U+0109, U+010A->U+010B, U+010B, U+010C->U+010D, U+010D, U+010E->U+010F, U+010F,\
U+0110->U+0111, U+0111, U+0112->U+0113, U+0113, U+0114->U+0115, U+0115, \
U+0116->U+0117,U+0117, U+0118->U+0119, U+0119, U+011A->U+011B, U+011B, U+011C->U+011D,\
U+011D,U+011E->U+011F, U+011F, U+0130->U+0131, U+0131, U+0132->U+0133, U+0133, \
U+0134->U+0135,U+0135, U+0136->U+0137, U+0137, U+0139->U+013A, U+013A, U+013B->U+013C, \
U+013C,U+013D->U+013E, U+013E, U+013F->U+0140, U+0140, U+0141->U+0142, U+0142, \
U+0143->U+0144,U+0144, U+0145->U+0146, U+0146, U+0147->U+0148, U+0148, U+014A->U+014B, \
U+014B,U+014C->U+014D, U+014D, U+014E->U+014F, U+014F, U+0150->U+0151, U+0151, \
U+0152->U+0153,U+0153, U+0154->U+0155, U+0155, U+0156->U+0157, U+0157, U+0158->U+0159,\
U+0159,U+015A->U+015B, U+015B, U+015C->U+015D, U+015D, U+015E->U+015F, U+015F, \
U+0160->U+0161,U+0161, U+0162->U+0163, U+0163, U+0164->U+0165, U+0165, U+0166->U+0167, \
U+0167,U+0168->U+0169, U+0169, U+016A->U+016B, U+016B, U+016C->U+016D, U+016D, \
U+016E->U+016F,U+016F, U+0170->U+0171, U+0171, U+0172->U+0173, U+0173, U+0174->U+0175,\
U+0175,U+0176->U+0177, U+0177, U+0178->U+00FF, U+00FF, U+0179->U+017A, U+017A, \
U+017B->U+017C,U+017C, U+017D->U+017E, U+017E, U+0410..U+042F->U+0430..U+044F, \
U+0430..U+044F,U+05D0..U+05EA, U+0531..U+0556->U+0561..U+0586, U+0561..U+0587, \
U+0621..U+063A, U+01B9,U+01BF, U+0640..U+064A, U+0660..U+0669, U+066E, U+066F, \
U+0671..U+06D3, U+06F0..U+06FF,U+0904..U+0939, U+0958..U+095F, U+0960..U+0963, \
U+0966..U+096F, U+097B..U+097F,U+0985..U+09B9, U+09CE, U+09DC..U+09E3, U+09E6..U+09EF, \
U+0A05..U+0A39, U+0A59..U+0A5E,U+0A66..U+0A6F, U+0A85..U+0AB9, U+0AE0..U+0AE3, \
U+0AE6..U+0AEF, U+0B05..U+0B39,U+0B5C..U+0B61, U+0B66..U+0B6F, U+0B71, U+0B85..U+0BB9, \
U+0BE6..U+0BF2, U+0C05..U+0C39,U+0C66..U+0C6F, U+0C85..U+0CB9, U+0CDE..U+0CE3, \
U+0CE6..U+0CEF, U+0D05..U+0D39, U+0D60,U+0D61, U+0D66..U+0D6F, U+0D85..U+0DC6, \
U+1900..U+1938, U+1946..U+194F, U+A800..U+A805,U+A807..U+A822, U+0386->U+03B1, \
U+03AC->U+03B1, U+0388->U+03B5, U+03AD->U+03B5,U+0389->U+03B7, U+03AE->U+03B7, \
U+038A->U+03B9, U+0390->U+03B9, U+03AA->U+03B9,U+03AF->U+03B9, U+03CA->U+03B9, \
U+038C->U+03BF, U+03CC->U+03BF, U+038E->U+03C5,U+03AB->U+03C5, U+03B0->U+03C5, \
U+03CB->U+03C5, U+03CD->U+03C5, U+038F->U+03C9,U+03CE->U+03C9, U+03C2->U+03C3, \
U+0391..U+03A1->U+03B1..U+03C1,U+03A3..U+03A9->U+03C3..U+03C9, U+03B1..U+03C1, \
U+03C3..U+03C9, U+0E01..U+0E2E,U+0E30..U+0E3A, U+0E40..U+0E45, U+0E47, U+0E50..U+0E59, \
U+A000..U+A48F, U+4E00..U+9FBF,U+3400..U+4DBF, U+20000..U+2A6DF, U+F900..U+FAFF, \
U+2F800..U+2FA1F, U+2E80..U+2EFF,U+2F00..U+2FDF, U+3100..U+312F, U+31A0..U+31BF, \
U+3040..U+309F, U+30A0..U+30FF,U+31F0..U+31FF, U+AC00..U+D7AF, U+1100..U+11FF, \
U+3130..U+318F, U+A000..U+A48F,U+A490..U+A4CF

}

##用户昵称增量索引##
index user_uname_delta : user_uname_main
{
    source          = user_uname_delta                                                  #对应的source名称
    path            = /usr/local/coreseek/var/data/zhb/user_uname_delta #索引存放的位置，路径为var/data
}


######全局index定义######
indexer
{
    mem_limit       = 128M
}

######searchd服务定义######
searchd
{
    listen                      = 9312
    read_timeout                = 5
    max_children                = 30
    max_matches                 = 10000
    seamless_rotate             = 0
    preopen_indexes             = 0
    unlink_old                  = 1
        compat_sphinxql_magics  = 0
    pid_file = /usr/local/coreseek/var/log/zhb/searchd_mysql.pid  #请修改为实际使用的绝对路径，例如：/usr/local/coreseek/var/...
    log = /usr/local/coreseek/var/log/zhb/searchd_mysql.log        #请修改为实际使用的绝对路径，例如：/usr/local/coreseek/var/...
    query_log = /usr/local/coreseek/var/log/zhb/query_mysql.log #请修改为实际使用的绝对路径，例如：/usr/local/coreseek/var/...
    binlog_path =                                #关闭binlog日志
}
